title: Remove or deprecate api/sync.ts
description:
The SyncClient in api/sync.ts is fully replaced by CloudCommsClient.

Either:
1. Delete api/sync.ts entirely if no remaining imports
2. Or mark as @deprecated with a comment pointing to CloudCommsClient

Check for any remaining imports and remove them.
acceptance_criteria: No runtime code imports from api/sync.ts, pnpm build succeeds
closed_reason: Removed api/sync.ts and stores/sync.ts. Refactored run-output-pane.ts to use comms store directly for cloud mode. Build passes.
